# Duangjai Studio Website

## Site Description
Duangjai Studio is a creative art space in Khon Kaen offering courses in Art, Film, and Photography. We focus on building student portfolios for university admission and fostering creativity.

## Main Routes
- / : Main landing page containing studio overview, latest student works, and course highlights.
- #courses : Information about art and design courses.
- #portfolio : "Dek Duangjai Show Port" - showcasing student portfolios.
- #about : Information about Duangjai Studio.

## Key Content
- **Art Courses**: Drawing, Painting, Composition for beginners to advanced levels.
- **Film & Photo**: Workshops on film photography, developing, and street photography on weekends.
- **Student Success**: Showcasing portfolios that helped students get into top creative universities in Thailand.

## Contact
- Line Official: https://lin.ee/9pzfzvh
- Location: Khon Kaen, Thailand.
